1.title: Jim Parsons, Kristin Cavallari, Savannah & Todd Chrisley
1.plot: In the Season 3 premiere, Tyler's visions are 20/20 when he connects "The Big Bang Theory" multi-Emmy winner Jim Parsons to his departed grandmothers on the other side. "The Hills" star and fashion icon Kristin Cavallari is brought to tears as Tyler demystifies her brother's final moments. After an amazing reading in Season 2 with "Chrisley Knows Best" stars Todd & Julie Chrisley, Todd gifts a reading to his daughter Savannah who is left in tears when Tyler makes a connection to her beloved grandfather.

2.title: Giuliana Rancic, Christina El Moussa, Katy Mixon, Taye Diggs
2.plot: Red carpet host Giuliana Rancic is brought to tears when Tyler relays shocking messages not only for Giuliana and her husband, but her best friend as well. "Flip or Flop" star Christa El Moussa flips out when Tyler channels advice about her divorce from her beloved deceased grandmother. The details of a tragic sibling's death are brought through from the other side, giving "American Housewife" star Katy Mixon and her family a desperately needed sense of peace. "Empire" headliner Taye Diggs becomes a believer when Tyler brings ...

3.title: Chrissy Metz, Taryn Manning, Iggy Azalea, Taye Diggs Follow-Up
3.plot: "This is Us" favorite Chrissy Metz is reinvigorated by Tyler's powerful message of hope from the other side for her ailing mother from Chrissy's beloved grandmother. Tyler heads to Manhattan to follow up with "Empire" headliner Taye Diggs on a prediction come true! "Orange is the New Black" star Taryn Manning's world is turned on its head when Tyler unveils revelations about her father's premature passing. Tyler is left awestruck to meet rap mega-star Iggy Azalea and provides powerful messages concerning her grandfather's health.

4.title: Megan Fox, Jewel, David and Rosanna Arquette, Nicole Sullivan
4.plot: Superstar Megan Fox reveals her own supernatural gifts to Tyler and shares her secret red carpet fears. "Black-ish" and "King of Queens" star Nicole Sullivan is brought to tears as her beloved deceased grandmother brings through a long-awaited message of forgiveness. Tyler heads to Nashville to share some shocking revelations from the other side about music legend Jewel's health and future. In a must-see emotional family reunion from beyond the grave, Tyler connects Hollywood legends David and Rosanna Arquette with their dearly departed sister, Alexis.

5.title: Erika Jayne Girardi, K. Michelle, Rick Fox, Padma Lakshmi
5.plot: Tyler connects Erika Jayne with her grandparents, gives hip-hop star K.Michelle much needed closure, and gives Padma Lakshmi some validation.

6.title: Lucy Hale, Tyler Oakley, Selma Blair
6.plot: Tyler delivers shocking details from the otherside for Lucy Hale, Tyler Oakley, and Selma Blair.

7.title: Arielle Kebbel, Ronda Rousey, Ronnie Ortiz-Magro, Chad Michael Murray
7.plot: "Midnight Texas" and "Ballers" star Arielle Kebbel has a tearful experience with Tyler as he makes a connection to a beloved deceased uncle. UFC fighter Ronda Rousey's tough exterior is shattered when Tyler brings forward a message from her beloved departed father. "Jersey Shore"'s Ronnie Ortiz-Magro is left stunned when Tyler connects to a close friend who died tragically just weeks before. A deep family mystery is revealed for "One Tree Hill" and "Agent Carter" star Chad Michael Murray when Tyler delivers long lost information from the other side.

8.title: Luann de Lesseps; Maddie Ziegler; Jax Taylor & Tom Sandoval; Tituss Burgess
8.plot: Tyler helps guilt-ridden Luann de Lesseps when he shares a mysterious message from a recently departed friend. Tyler leaves his youngest client sobbing with tears when he delivers dance virtuoso Maddie Ziegler and her mom a heartwarming message from her grandmother.

9.title: Brooke Burke-Charvet, Robert Buckley, Hayley Orrantia, Soleil Moon Frye
9.plot: Tyler has a highly emotional reading for Brooke Burke-Charvet, shocks Robert Buckley with messages from beyond, and leaves Soleil Moon Frye in tears.

10.title: Teresa Giudice, Jeannie & Mama Mai, La Toya Jackson
10.plot: Teresa Giudice struggles to hold it together in an emotional reading, La Toya Jackson gets some long needed closure, and Jeannie Mai is presented with a trove of family secrets from beyond.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Jaime Pressly unexpectedly connects with a young Hollywood star who died tragically. NeNe Leakes confronts secrets from her past. Tyler connects Bella Thorne to her beloved deceased family member. John Salley gets confirmation from beyond about his daughter's future.

2.title: Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi/Monica Potter/Tom Arnold
2.plot: Nicole Polizzi has an emotional connection with her beloved late uncle; Tyler delivers a life-altering message to Monica Potter from her deceased father; Tom Arnold resolution and closure.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Tyler delivers detailed messages to Ross Mathews from his late father. Jodie Sweetin receives validation from her departed grandmother that she is on the right path. Margret Cho gets an unexpected visit from beyond by a comedy legend. Jillian Rose Reed is left speechless by an emotional message from a deceased young family member.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Tyler makes a tearful connection for Amber Rose and her mother to a beloved aunt. A rock star brother who died of a drug overdose sends a message from beyond to Heather and Terry Dubrow. Tyler connects to a dark presence from a painful childhood experience to help bring closure to Cheryl Burke.

5.title: Tracey Gold/Nataya Neidhart/Michael Sam/Christopher Knight
5.plot: A murdered child reaches out to Tracey Gold; WWE Diva Natalie Neidhart's tough exterior is shattered, when Tyler makes a heartbreaking connection to lost loved ones within her family; Michael Sam receives unexpected insight about his long-lost brother; Christopher Knight.

6.title: The Lawrence Brothers/Candis Cayne/Loni Love
6.plot: Tyler delivers a life-changing message to Joey Lawrence, Matthew Lawrence and Andrew Lawrence from their departed grandmother; and gets starstruck meeting Candis Cayne, who asks for his help dealing with a friend's tragic death; and Loni Love.

7.title: Terrell Owens/Fairuza Balk/Olivia Culpo/Carnie Wilson
7.plot: Tyler sees a mysterious woman in Terrell Owens love life; Fairuza Balk makes a shocking connection to her recently departed brother; Olivia Culpo is in awe of Tyler's amazing abilities; and Carnie Wilson receives a warning and a message of hope.

8.title: DJ Qualls/Boy George/Rob Dyrdek/Charisma Carpenter
8.plot: DJ Qualls is left shocked; Boy George refuses to accept what Tyler predicts for his love life; Tyler gives Rob Dyrdek a frighteningly accurate medical reading and upcoming baby prediction for Charisma Carpenter.

9.title: Omarosa/Ashley Hamilton/RJ Mitte/Carmen Electra
9.plot: Tyler Henry does his first readings for Omarosa Manigault, Ashley Hamilton, RJ Mitte, and Carmen Electra.

10.title: Tyler's Top Ten
10.plot: Tyler picks his top 10 favorite celebrity readings from Season 1. Included: he shares never-before-seen footage and his own personal thoughts about these life-changing moments.

1.title: Melissa Joan Hart/Madison Beer/Snooki Follow Up
1.plot: In the Season 2 premiere, Melissa Joan Hart is a skeptic-turned-believer, when her reading with Tyler reveals a hidden family secret and connects to her deceased father. Meanwhile: Madison Beer receives a message from a childhood friend who died tragically. And finally, Tyler travels to New Jersey to meet Nicole Polizzi's family and bring them emotional closure.

2.title: Jennifer Esposito/Whitney Port/Kris Jenner
2.plot: Tears are shed when Tyler connects an object to a recently departed loved one, during a meeting with Jennifer Esposito; Whitney Port gets emotional, when she receives a message from her dead father; Kris Jenner and Khloé Kardashian are stunned that a family member is watching them from beyond the grave.

3.title: Kendra Wilkinson/Lil Jon/Carole Radziwill
3.plot: Lil Jon is reconnected with a loved one, who died too young; Kendra Wilkinson receives news from the other side about the future of her family; and Tyler travels to New York City, where he helps journalist Carole Radziwill get closure, after the death of a famous friend.

4.title: Corey Feldman/Rachel Hunter/Evelyn Lozada
4.plot: Corey Feldman attempts to communicate with his close friend, Corey Haim; Rachel Hunter receives encouragement and peace, as Tyler tries to reach out to her deceased trailblazing grandmother; Evelyn Lozada and her daughter Shaniece Hairston get emotional, during a reading that connects them to a beloved brother-in-law.

5.title: Audrina Patridge/Moby/Austin Mahone/Roselyn Sanchez
5.plot: Tyler finds a family mystery with Audrina Patridge; and shocks Moby with details from his mother. Austin Mahone gets answers about his father; Roselyn Sanchez connects with her grandmother.

6.title: Maria Menounos/Retta/Pia Toscano/Larry Birkhead
6.plot: Maria Menounos receives messages of comfort that help ease her guilt over the passing of several loved ones; Tyler tells Retta that her late grandmother has warnings about her health and finances; Pia Toscano gets very emotional over her deceased grandfather; and Larry Birkhead says a final goodbye to his ex-girlfriend, Anna Nicole Smith.

7.title: The Bella Twins/Dr. Paul Nassif/Metta World Peace
7.plot: WWE divas Brie Bella and Nikki Bella reconnect with a long-lost love, who was tragically killed in high school; Dr. Paul Nassif and his sister are moved to tears by a message from their late mother; Ron Artest (aka Metta World Peace) has his world shaken by an old family tragedy; and Tori Spelling is brought together with an important person from her past.

8.title: Eva Longoria/Bobby Brown/Jwoww
8.plot: Searching for confirmation, Tyler makes an emotional connection to actress Eva Longoria's loved ones; After her recent loss, Tyler connects to the deceased daughter of Bobby Brown; While also shocking the usually unflappable JWoww.

9.title: Mel B/Reza Farahan/Jana Kramer/Tionne "T-Boz" Watkins
9.plot: Tyler connects Mel B (Mel B) to her family members and a beloved patriarch; Reza Farahan never had the opportunity of spending time with his two deceased grandfathers, battling each other for his attention; Tyler stuns Jana Kramer and her friends, when he brings a message from beyond; Tyler reconnects Tionne 'T-Boz' Watkins with her best friend, Lisa 'Left Eye' Lopes.

10.title: Nico Tortorella/Ice-t & Coco Austin/Alan Thicke
10.plot: Tyler connects Nico Tortorella with his grandfather; while Coco Austin believes in mediums, her husband Ice-T does not; Tyler gives Alan Thicke and his wife, Tanya Callau Thicke, a warning with a shocking premonition, shortly before his tragic passing.

11.title: Janice Dickinson/Joanna Krupa/Marlee Matlin
11.plot: Tyler helps Janice Dickinson make a connection with John Belushi; while helping Joanna Krupa, Tyler helps her to solve a Polish murder mystery; Tyler helps Marlee Matlin make a connection with her departed father, who offers information to help explain her deafness.

12.title: Khloé Kardashian and Kylie Jenner/RuPaul/Elisha Cuthbert
12.plot: Tyler helps Khloé Kardashian and Kylie Jenner discover some shocking news about their love lives; Tyler meets RuPaul and helps him to connect with his departed parents; then, Tyler helps Elisha Cuthbert and her family get closure, after the death of a beloved grandmother.

13.title: Lisa Vanderpump/Allison Janney/Portia de Rossi/Kacey Musgraves
13.plot: Tyler connects Lisa Vanderpump to her departed grandmother; Allison Janney has questions answered about the death of a sibling; Tyler helps Portia de Rossi connect with the man who helped her beat an eating disorder; while Kacey Musgraves hears details about her grandmother's death.

14.title: Stassi Schroeder & Kristen Doute/Johnny Weir/Nancy Grace
14.plot: Stassi Schroeder and Kristen Doute (Vanderpump Rules (2013)) have an intense reading which helps them both solve family mysteries; Olympic figure skater Johnny Weir gets answers about his very public divorce; Nancy Grace emotionally releases long-held guilt over her father's death.

15.title: Jenna Dewan Tatum/Emily VanCamp/Pauly D
15.plot: Jenna Dewan solve the mystery of a catastrophic family death; Paul 'Pauly D' DelVecchio makes a shocking connection to his tragically killed best friend; Emily VanCamp becomes emotional when Tyler uncovers a gut-wrenching decision her family had to make.

16.title: Todd & Julie Chrisley/Patti Stanger/Adrienne Palicki
16.plot: Skeptic Todd Chrisley breaks down in tears during an emotional and transformational reading; Patti Stanger questions why her adoptive mom kept her from her birth mother; Adrianne Palicki makes an emotional connection to her departed grandmother.

17.title: Ryan Loche/Tabatha Colley/Becky G/Mischa Barton
17.plot: Ryan Lochte gets a message from his deceased grandfather about his gold medal win; Tabatha Coffey gets an emotional message from her departed mother; Becky G connects with her guardian angels; Mischa Barton connects with relatives.

18.title: Shanola Hampton with Amy Smart/Brett Eldredge/Brooke Burns/Linda Blair
18.plot: Shanola Hampton makes a deeply emotional re-connection with her beloved mother; Brett Eldredge is in shock when his beloved grandfather speaks to him about his career; Brooke Burns receives answers about a tragic double death in her family.

19.title: Kim Zolciak-Biermann & Kroy Biermann/Jaleel White/Peter Facinelli
19.plot: Kim Zolciak-Biermann and Kroy Biermann get medical advice from a deceased loved one; Jaleel White connects to his beloved deceased co-star, Michelle Thomas; Peter Facinelli connects with his late grandfather.

20.title: Brandi Glanville/Joanna Garcia Swisher/Chuck Liddell/Tiffany Haddish
20.plot: Brandi Glanville connects with the one person in her life who made her feel special; JoAnna Garcia Swisher gets a message about forgiveness; Chuck Liddell gets specific messages from the one person in his life who believed in him.

21.title: Lil' Kim/Jamie-Lynn Sigler and Lance Bass/Dr. Drew
21.plot: Lil' Kim is reunited with her beloved soulmate, The Notorious B.I.G.; best friends Jamie-Lynn Sigler and Lance Bass have a joint reading; Dr. Drew Pinsky is converted from skeptic to believer.

imdb.title: Hollywood Medium
plot: _Hollywood Medium_ (qv), 'Tyler Henry' (qv), meets with celebrities and shares messages from their departed loved ones.
